general_advisory: Drain out excess water from paddy field for rice cultivation. Take regular surveillance in all crops to control disease pests. Utilize available water for summer rice cultivation. Follow necessary procedures in the cultivation of sugarcane, blackgram, rapeseed & mustard, vegetables, pisciculture, and animal science.

advisory: Increased temperature difference may lead to blast infestation. Use appropriate fungicides and insecticides as needed.
Collect setts from healthy plants for sowing. Implement sett rot management practices. Remove diseased plants in ratoon crop.
Spray recommended pesticides to control diseases and aphids.
Control pests through timely spraying of insecticides. Provide necessary care during the flowering stage.
Use appropriate pesticides to manage pests in cucurbits. Start sowing tomato seeds for summer cultivation. Provide support for tomato plants.
Treat fish for white spot disease symptoms.
Regularly provide mineral mixture and salt to animals. Include wheat grains and jaggery in their diet during winter.
